attributes.action: deal with overpopulation and its effects-encourage small families in the u.k. to reduce global warming and environmental damage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The more children people have the larger their ecologocal footprint, small families (0-3 children) are better for the environment and the economy than big families. Encourage small families by taxing large families to reduce global warming!! Small family = more land, better education, less pollution, less crime, less reliance on imports, no energy crisis, less cars on the road, overall a better way of life and standard of living.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
